title: None for the road
brief_description: A discussion of the problem of teenage drinking and driving. Three college men, one doing no drinking, one drinking beer, and one drinking heavily, are studied. The results are compared to the effects of equivalent amounts of alcohol on rats. Depicts an accident resulting from only casual drinking before driving.
